price: 43. Bilongi na bango bikokitisama mpe bakozanga lokumu, nzoka nde babiangamaki mpo bafukama tango bazalaki malamu (na mokili).
arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kānū yud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi wahum sālimūna
